phrases: I've always struggled with high blood pressure, but it's seeming to get really out of control lately.
you're on Norvasc and we had to increase your dose, you're on 10 milligrams a day.
I have had some headaches. I don't know if that's just because of more stress at work or because of the high blood pressure.
everything's been good and solid there.

heart is irregular rate and rhythm. I do hear a slight two out of six systolic ejection murmur. Your lungs are clear. I do see the scar on the left left plank for your kidney transplant which is healed. You have no lower extremity edema.
prescribe you coreg 25 milligrams, twice a day.
get a lipid panel and some routine labs on you just to make sure that everything is.
continue you on all of those medications.
schedule a follow-up appointment with me, and we'll see what your blood pressure looks in a couple weeks.
